licenses.name: DL-DE-BY-2.0
licenses.title: Open Data Datenlizenz Deutschland – Namensnennung – Version 2.0
licenses.instruction: The data and meta-data provided may, for commercial and non-commercial use, in particular be copied, printed, presented, altered, processed and transmitted to third parties; be merged with own data and with the data of others and be combined to form new and independent datasets;be integrated in internal and external business processes, products and applications in public and non-public electronic networks.

licenses.instruction: The data and meta-data provided may, for commercial and non-commercial use, in particular be copied, printed, presented, altered, processed and transmitted to third parties; be merged with own data and with the data of others and be combined to form new and independent datasets;be integrated in internal and external business processes, products and applications in public and non-public electronic networks.

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
_comment.todo: If a value is not yet available, use: todo
